ch0196_00_fleurdelis/0101_0701_01_10:
I see you’re working very hard today, 
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/0101_0701_02_10:
I can feel the fire of your convictions burning deep
within your heart. Make sure it never goes out.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/0601_0701_01_10:
These devices that are being given out to all sync 
pairs... Poryphones, are they?
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/0601_0701_02_10:
These things are crucial to our everyday life. 
Pokégear, PokéNav, Xtransceivers, and Holo 
Casters are the same.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/0601_0701_03_10: Knowledge is power. Please put it to good use.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/0602_0701_01_10:
Just as how the Kalos region’s two Legendary
Pokémon gave life and took life, people can be
divided into two groups.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/0602_0701_02_10: Those who give and those who take!
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/0602_0701_03_10:
However, in this world, some foolish humans exist
who would show their strength by taking what
isn’t theirs.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/0602_0701_04_10:
Fools who feel entitled to what they have been
given will only rot the world.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/0603_0701_01_10:
I hear there is a group calling themselves Team
Break here on Pasio—and that they’re causing all
sorts of problems...
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/0603_0701_02_10:
They’re just trying to show their strength by
stealing. What filth!
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/0603_0701_03_10:
I’m sure you understand that Pokémon are not
tools for humans to fight each other with.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/0603_0701_04_10:
And that people who do think that Pokémon are
tools are beyond saving, no matter how hard
you try.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/0604_0701_01_10:
Three thousand years ago, the King of Kalos
created a device to bring back the Pokémon that
were lost...
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/0604_0701_02_10:
But eventually, that device was used as a weapon
of destruction.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/0604_0701_03_10:
Although it was made in order to create hope,
it ended up becoming a weapon. How ironic.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/0604_0701_04_10:
That is why I will change it back into a beacon of 
hope! This is all for the sake of returning the world
back to its former beauty!
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/0605_0701_01_10: I don’t think that taking is a sign of strength.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/0605_0701_02_10:
In order to become the PML champion, you’ll have
to defeat all rival sync pairs to get there.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/0605_0701_03_10:
You shouldn’t just aim to be the champion. You
should also think about what it means to claim
that spot.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/0605_0701_04_10:
I’d like to see what you’ll do with the strength
you’ve been given...
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/0605_0701_05_10:
Show me the future that you 
choose, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/1701_0701_01_10: Here, take this. Let it help you in some way.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/1701_0701_02_10:
It’s an apology for always taking up so much of
your precious time.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/1701_0702_01_10:
It’s important to be able to sincerely give thanks
for what you have been given.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/1701_0702_02_10:
If someone ever comes asking you for help, I hope
you can pass it forward and help them.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2501_0701_01_10:
Phew... Taking breaks is important. How about a
cup of coffee?
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2501_0701_02_10:
I may not look it, but I actually own a café, so
I’m picky about how my coffee is made.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2501_0701_03_10:
The fragrant aroma of coffee puts my soul
at ease...
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2501_0701_04_10:
I think that small breaks are something we need to
make a beautiful, ideal world.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2501_0702_01_10:
Cafés are wonderful establishments. They bring
happiness to people who rest their feet and relax.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2501_0702_02_10:
I hope the world can become a place where we
can share our kindness and happiness with
each other.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2511_0701_01_10:
I have no intention of believing that what I do is
always for the sake of absolute justice.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2511_0701_02_10:
If that were the case, Pokémon would never have
to go through what we put them through.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2511_0701_03_10: It saddens me to think of how powerless I am...
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2511_0701_04_10:
There were many sacrifices made in the pursuit of
my ideals, yet I cannot stop what I’ve started.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2511_0702_01_10:
Perhaps there will come a time when the flames
of our convictions will clash.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/2511_0702_02_10:
Your future...or mine? We will ask our partner
Pokémon which is right when we have that battle.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/3001_0701_01_10:
Another perfect morning in a beautiful world.
The people, on the other hand...
No bother. I will change all of that.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/3003_0701_01_10:
I’m curious to see what sort of future our
meeting will bring.
ch0196_00_fleurdelis/3005_0701_01_10:
I walk in the shadows so I can be a shining
beacon for the future of humanity.
